full_summary:
### Department of National Defence Supply Arrangement - W8485-184741 Series - Aviation Replacement Parts

**Procurement Reference Number**: PW-23-01021727

**Publication Date**: January 17th, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: January 31st, 2023, at 2:00 pm (EST)

### Background

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking qualified bidders to supply Aviation Replacement Parts under the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series. This requirement is for the CT114 aircraft.

**Eligibility**

Only Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series are eligible to submit a proposal.

**Pre-Qualification Opportunity**
A Notice will be posted at the least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.

**Participating Suppliers**

* Simex Defence
* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* JHT Defense Inc.
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* Honeywell Ltd
* Mattis Aerospace
* M1 Composites Technology

### Tender Description

The contract is to acquire 1 item(s) for the CT114 aircraft. The Government of Canada will provide electronic document delivery - Automated Solicitation of Offers (ASOL) will not be used for this requirement.

**Inquiries**

Inquiries regarding this solicitation should be submitted to:
Duncan, Ryan
Aerospace Equipment Program Management
Department of National Defence
455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca

**Contact Information**

* Samantha Coles, Supply Team Leader
* Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada
Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector
Civilian Aircraft Division - CAG
samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please note that this Division is teleworking during the COVID-19. The best way to contact us is through email.

### Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

* Canada

### Regions of Delivery

* Canada

### Procurement Category

* GD - Goods and Services

### Notice Type

* Request for Proposal (R
